translation: He sees, who sees that all actions are performed solely by Nature and that the Self is without action.
commentary: 13.30 Prakritiya by Nature? Eve alone? f and? Karmani actions? being performed? All in all? who who? sees sees? And so also? Atmana the Self? Akartaram actionless? Sah he? sees sees.Commentary Nature is responsible for all activities. The Self is beyond all action. It is the silent witness only. He who experiences thus is the real seer or sage
